title.rendered: Pura Luxe Protein Smoothing Treatment – Exclusive to Luxe Concept Salon

content.rendered:
Whether your hair is wavy, curly, ethnic or chemically treated, Pura Luxe Protein Smoothing Treatment is all you need for straight, smooth and silky hair.

At Luxe Concept Salon we are always searching to bring our clients the most technologically advanced hair treatments and we are excited to announce that we are now one of the first salons to offer our namesake, Pura Luxe.

Pura Luxe Protein Smoothing Treatment is non-toxic, natural, keratin, sulphate and formaldehyde-free formulation that promises to eliminate or significantly reduce frizz while delivering straighter, smoother and stronger hair. Formulated with natural proteins and essential oils, the protein contained in the Pura Luxe treatment penetrates through to the hair’s cortex while the essential fatty oils wrap and protect the hair from day-to-day elements that our hair endures.

Pura Luxa’s patented, revolutionary formulations contain six types of amino acids that straighten the hair by transforming the internal textural memory of the hair. The presence of the amino acids in this smoothing treatment creates hair that is rich in Keratin, making it smooth and shiny while improving the condition of the hair with prolonged use. It is considered to be safer alternative to traditional Keratin treatments.

How Does Pura Luxe Differ from Traditional Relaxing Treatments?

  • It is a non-toxic amino based system, meaning there is no formaldehyde or toxic fumes.
  • Unlike traditional smoothing treatments that last 2-3 months, Pura delivers results for up to six months.
  • Clients can have their hair coloured or washed as soon as they please after having the treatment, as opposed to the 5-7 day down time of Keratin treatments.
  • The Amino Building Blocker technology penetrates the hair allowing the bonds to stretch. Prolonged use of the treatment will actually improve the strength, shine and overall feel of the hair. 

Made in a state-of-the-art facility in Los Angeles, California, the Pura Luxe Relaxing Treatment is rich in patented ingredients that stands it apart from traditional Keratin treatments on the market. Key ingredients include:

  • A combination of Glyoxylic acid + cysteine + acetic acid: Used to straighten and strengthen hair, while also assisting the bonds found in your hair to hold their shape.
  • Caprylic Capric Triglyceride (CCT): Leaves hair feeling noticeably silky and delivers excellent anti-oxidant properties.
  • Cetrimonium Chloride: Stops the build of static electricity in hair, which in turn makes hair smoother and easier to manage.
  • Polyquaternium-7: An organic compound that is an excellent detnagler and provides slip for easier wet-combing

Pura Luxe FAQ’s

Q: Will the Pura Luxe Protein Smoothing Treatment straighten curly hair?
A: Yes – it will straighten wavy, curly and kinky hair, remove the frizz and leave the hair smooth, soft and shiny.

Q: Can I have Pura Luxe if I have natural/virgin hair?
A: Absolutely – the treatment can be used on all hair types whether it has been coloured or not. Bleached and highlighted hair is also perfectly fine to be treated with Pura Luxe.

Q: When is the best time to colour my hair? Before or after the Pura Luxe Treatment?
A: It is recommended to colour and/or highlight hair any time after the treatment – can even be the same day.

Q: Can I do the Pura Luxe treatment if my hair has been previously chemically straightened?
A: Yes, it can be applied to hair that has been previously straightened and will bond to the hair making it stronger and smooth.

Q: Will swimming in salt or chlorinated water shorten the life span of the treatment?
A: No – unlike traditional Keratin or relaxing treatments, chlorine and salt water will not affect the quality of the Pura Luxe treatment.

Q: How long does the Pura Luxe Smoothing Treatment last?
A: The results typically last up to 6 months. Everyone’s hair is different, some hair is more resistant than others.

Q: How do I care for my Pura Luxe treatment at home
A: We recommend in using a sulfate free shampoo (we love all Davines products that are sulphate free)

All bookings, consultations and general enquiries can be arranged either by phone, online or with the Luxe staff in the salon.
